title: This game is so toxic now.
body: Riot pls bring back the "unsportsmanlike behavior" report option. :(

replies.body: What would that category cover that "Negative Attitude" does not?
when has league NOT been toxic af?

Unsportmanlike behavior is VERY broad.

Refusing to end might be a reason, but people are trying to farm S+ for Mastery tokens, can't blame'em
Troll,Feeding and Negative behavior are all reportable as separate things.

I think the problem with 'unsportsmanlike behavior' was that it was too broad and not really a fair category when looked at objectively. You could argue that splitpushing while your team fights a 4v5 is unsportsmanlike even though that player is trying their hardest to take objectives or play to their strengths. The current categories we have cover pretty much everything, although I'd like to see passive-aggressive griefing hit a bit harder.

"This game is so toxic now."

"Now"? lol
